en: This is a photograph of Jawaharal Nehru.
His mother name is Swaroopa Rani.
Her husband's name is Feroz Gandhi.
This is my Telugu book, sir!
And that is my English book.
The name of the Telugu book:
This is not my book, sir!
He is Rammurti, Mr Sivayya's son.
What is your grandfather's name, dear?
child (female), a little girl (an affectionate address term)
child (male), a little boy (an affectionate address term)
